<H2 CLASS="western">DOMAIN ANALYSIS</H2>
<P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm"><BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">	Domain analysis for social services
community project is done by considering 4 important features. These
are:</P>
<OL>
	<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">Customer and user profiles</P>
	<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm"><SPAN LANG="tr-TR">D</SPAN>esign,
	usability, environment, size and suitability</P>
	<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm"><SPAN LANG="tr-TR">A</SPAN>dvantages
	&amp; <SPAN LANG="tr-TR">D</SPAN>isadvantages</P>
	<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm"><SPAN LANG="tr-TR">T</SPAN>echnologies
	used in development</P>
</OL>
<P STYLE="margin-left: 1.27cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="margin-left: 1.27cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">According to these
criteria, 2 websites which are similar to our project is examined.
These websites are &lsquo;Servisimo.com&rsquo; and
&lsquo;VolunteerMatch???&rsquo;. 
</P>
<P STYLE="margin-left: 1.27cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><BR>
</P>
<H3 CLASS="western"><SPAN LANG="tr-TR">SERVISIMO.COM</SPAN></H3>
<P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm"><FONT SIZE=5 STYLE="font-size: 20pt"><SPAN LANG="tr-TR"><B>TANIM_
KARŞILAŞTIRMA- --1 c&uuml;mlelik eklenecek</B></SPAN></FONT></P>
<H4 CLASS="western" ALIGN=LEFT><SPAN LANG="tr-TR">1. USERS</SPAN></H4>
<UL>
	<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">People who</P>
	<UL>
		<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">Want to buy service</P>
		<UL>
			<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">see the offers 
			</P>
			<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">compare the offers 
			</P>
			<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">and select the best offer</P>
			<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">make an appointment to buy the
			service</P>
		</UL>
		<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">Want to offer service</P>
		<UL>
			<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">present their profile</P>
			<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">make offers for demands</P>
			<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">get the offer accepted</P>
			<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">make an appointment to give the
			service</P>
			<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm"></P>
		</UL>
	</UL>
</UL>
<H4 CLASS="western" ALIGN=LEFT>2. Design, Usability, Environment,
Size, Suitability</H4>
<P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm"><BR>
</P>
<UL>
	<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm"><B>Design:</B> Simple, not
	complicated, efficient.</P>
	<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm"><B>Usability:</B> Easy to
	understand and use, user friendly.</P>
	<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm"><B>Environment:</B> Web
	environment, easily accessible from everywhere.</P>
	<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm"><B>Size:</B> Limited. Covers
	services just for Istanbul. 
	</P>
	<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm"><B>Suitability:</B> Suitable for
	any other demand-supply services.</P>
</UL>
<P STYLE="margin-left: 1.27cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><BR>
</P>
<H4 CLASS="western" ALIGN=LEFT>3. Advantages &amp; Disadvantages</H4>
<P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm"><BR>
</P>
<P STYLE="margin-left: 2.54cm; margin-right: 2.54cm; margin-top: 0.28cm; margin-bottom: 0cm; border-top: 1px solid #632423; border-bottom: 1px solid #632423; border-left: none; border-right: none; padding-top: 0.35cm; padding-bottom: 0.14cm; padding-left: 0cm; padding-right: 0cm; line-height: 125%">
<FONT COLOR="#622423"><FONT SIZE=2>ADVANTAGES:</FONT></FONT></P>
<UL>
	<UL>
		<UL>
			<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">Simple and efficient usage of
			the web-site for both service provider and service demander.</P>
			<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">Trustworthy place to look for
			getting or giving services.</P>
			<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">Time saving.</P>
			<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">Accessible from everywhere via
			internet.</P>
		</UL>
	</UL>
</UL>
<P STYLE="margin-left: 2.54cm; margin-right: 2.54cm; margin-top: 0.28cm; margin-bottom: 0cm; border-top: 1px solid #632423; border-bottom: 1px solid #632423; border-left: none; border-right: none; padding-top: 0.35cm; padding-bottom: 0.14cm; padding-left: 0cm; padding-right: 0cm; line-height: 125%">
<FONT COLOR="#622423"><FONT SIZE=2><SPAN LANG="tr-TR">DISADVANTAGES:</SPAN></FONT></FONT></P>
<UL>
	<UL>
		<UL>
			<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">Cannot see the offers without
			making a demand.</P>
			<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">Limited. Just for Istanbul, does
			not include any other cities.</P>
			<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">No photos, visual presentation
			could be better.</P>
		</UL>
	</UL>
</UL>
<P STYLE="margin-left: 3.81cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><BR>
</P>

		<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">HTML, CSS, Javascript, AJAX,

		<LI><P STYLE="margin-bottom: 0cm">SQL databases.</P>
